This repo contains the source Shiny files for the Coursera JHU/Data Science: Data Products class project.  

The application can be run at https://tbudris.shinyapps.io/EBAC (note the app documentation is provided via the 'Help' tab within the app itself).  

A brief presentation pitching this app can be viewed at http://rpubs.com/tbudris/yyyyy
